TEXT: The applicant is an NORP citizen , born in DATE and residing in GPE . At the material time the applicant was a civil servant in ORG serving as a member of the diplomatic corps . Since DATE the applicant is retired .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

DATE the applicant was assigned to the NORP embassy in GPE as “ LOC ” , i.e. a diplomat who may be called upon to represent the Ambassador . In DATE , after having returned to GPE , he applied for a hardship allowance ( PERSON ) for the time of his service in GPE which was granted to him on DATE by ORG ( Verwaltungsgerichtshof ) . His requests to have the case reopened were rejected on DATE .
